org.apache.metamodel.delete
Class DeleteFrom

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.metamodel.delete.DeleteFrom
All Implemented Interfaces:
WhereClauseBuilder<DeleteFrom>, UpdateScript, Action<UpdateCallback>
public final class DeleteFrom
extends Object
implements UpdateScript, WhereClauseBuilder<DeleteFrom>

Represents a single DELETE FROM operation to be applied to a UpdateableDataContext. Instead of providing a custom implementation of the UpdateScript interface, one can use this pre-built delete from implementation. Some DataContexts may even optimize specifically based on the knowledge that there will only be a single delete from statement executed.
